Description: Portrait of woman in tempera on coarse stuccoed linen; subject depicted holding glass unguentarium.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Kom el-Kharaba el-Kebir (Previously recorded as Rubaiyat)
Curator's comments: Published: S. Walker and M. Bierbrier, Fayum. Misteriosi volti dall'Egitto, London 1997, p. 109 [78].
Bibliographic references: Parlasca & Seeman 1999 / Augenblicke. Mumienporträts und ägyptische Grabkunst aus römischer Zeit (p.196, no.101)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1997 22 Oct-1998 30 Apr, Italy, Rome, Fondaione Memmo, Ancient Faces
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Robert Ludwig Mond
